sentences.en: But for now, she is in the grip of a blind, unfocused anger.
sentences.cn: 而现在，她陷入了一种无名的愤怒之中。

sentences.en: Her eyes were unfocused, as if she were staring inside at her memories of the day.
sentences.cn: 她目光呆滞，仿佛沉浸在那天的记忆当中。

sentences.en: In ground - penetrating radar profile, the image of subsurface structure is distorted and unfocused due to diffractions.
sentences.cn: 在探地雷达的实测资料中, 由于绕射波的存在导致了地下结构图象显示不清.

sentences.en: She talks very fast. If you are unfocused, you will not be able to follow her.
sentences.cn: 她语速很快, 你稍不留意就听不清她说的是什么.
讨论的焦点越来越分散。

sentences.en: The research is too unfocused to have any significant impact.
sentences.cn: 这一次的研究太零散，难以发挥重大的作用。

sentences.en: The scatty, glancing quality of a hyperactive but unfocused intelligence ( London Review of Books ).
sentences.cn: 极度活跃但无聚焦点的思想 ( 伦敦图书评论 ).

sentences.en: There definitely is anger now, bright and hot and unfocused.
sentences.cn: 现在他是真的生气了,眼睛发亮, 脸涨得通红,怒气无处可泄.

sentences.en: This can help prevent you and winding up with a disorganized, unfocused site.
sentences.cn: 这样可以避免网站给用户留下无序 、 令人印象不深刻的印象.

sentences.en: You may take some action, but your movements will be chaotic and unfocused.
sentences.cn: 你可以采取一些行动, 但步骤混乱,毫无重点.

trans.tran_cn: 未聚焦的，（目光）茫然的，无目标的
trans.tran_en: not dealing with or paying attention to the most important ideas, causes etc
